backend/main.mo: Defines the main sweet shop canister with authorization, in‑memory maps for sweets, reviews, and user profiles, and methods for profile access plus initial sweet population.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting older list-based sweet storage into a new map-based structure while initializing empty user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise human-written summaries for all major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling configs.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with Rajasthan-inspired palette tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that loads the main React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manages high-level page routing and renders pages within the shared AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the site-wide layout including header, navigation, authentication controls, branding, and footer with social links.
frontend/src/components/HygieneReviewFor: Implements a form for authenticated users to submit hygiene ratings and optional text reviews with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/components/HygieneReviewLis: Displays hygiene reviews with loading and empty states, sorting them before rendering in a scrollable list.
frontend/src/components/HygieneStats.tsx: Shows average hygiene rating and total review count, with loading and styled stat cards.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Renders interactive or read-only star ratings with size options and click handling.
frontend/src/components/SweetCard.tsx: Card component showing a sweet’s image, details, category badge, and a button to view more.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching sweets, reviews, roles, and submitting or updating data through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom Rajasthan-inspired color palette and base styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of sweets loaded via useSweets, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HygienePage.tsx: Shows hygiene stats, a review submission form, and a list of recent reviews using dedicated components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders a marketing landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to catalog and hygiene pages.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerCatalogPage.tsx: Provides authenticated owners with forms to add new sweets and update prices, using queries and mutations for backend operations.
frontend/src/pages/SweetDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected sweet, with loading/error handling and navigation back to the catalog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom Rajasthan-themed color palettes, container settings, dark mode, content paths, and plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including versioning, feature requirements for a Rajasthan-themed sweet shop app, and metadata about existing functionalities.
